titles.title: MP1018 You Are Merciful To Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are merciful to me,
You are merciful to me,
You are merciful to me, my Lord.
You Are Merciful To Me,
You are merciful to me,
You are merciful to me, my Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Every day my disobedience
Grieves Your loving heart;
But then redeeming love breaks through,
And causes me to worship You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
(Men (Women echo))
Redeemer,
Saviour,
Healer
And Friend.
Every day
Renew my ways,
Fill me with love
That never ends.
